title: New: Shaky Snakes – Blue Seven
body:
**Ian Allan Johnston**‘s moniker [**Shaky Snakes**](https://www.facebook.com/shakysnakess) appears in the front line once again with stunning new track **Blue Seven**. The Portland based producer draws an experimental late night disco groovin’ line, merged with a kraut-inspired balearic experience and a beat to kill for. Balancing somewhere between the ’70s kosmische futurism and **Lindstrom**‘s galloping vibes, with **Blue Seven, [**Shaky Snakes**](https://www.facebook.com/shakysnakess)** establishes himself as a name to keep an eye out for in 2014.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/123164737″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
